content: *a perfect gift for a spring baby shower or easter this adorable rattle matches our bunny patterns wonderfully lion brand yarn * lion brand pattern 80094ad skill level easy lion® wool article #820 2 colors 1 ball each *shown in pumpkin & lemongrass* crochet hook - size g-6 4 mm fiberfill stuffing jingle bell worked in continuous rounds some construction required to finish also available at michaels com on the wayback machine lion brand crochet carrot rattle 1 1 https //web archive org/web/20130929122014/http //www michaels com/lion-brand-crochet-carrot-rattle/e07026 default pd html
